Examples

    Here is a simple example that computes the parameters of the copula:

    >>> from copulalib import copulafit
>>> import Numpy as np 
>>> x = array([1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6]) 
>>> pymat.eval(H, 'y = dct(x)') 
>>> print pymat.get(H, 'y') 
    [ 8.57321410e+00 -4.16256180e+00 -1.55403172e-15 -4.08248290e-01 -1.88808530e-15 -8.00788912e-02] 
>>> pymat.close(H)
